segment.source: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection files
segment.target: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection files

segment.source: Use the investigation options to get details on files associated with alerts, behaviours, or events.
segment.target: Use the investigation options to get details on files associated with alerts, behaviours, or events.

segment.source: Investigate a file associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate a file associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: Investigate the details of a file associated with a specific alert, behavior, or event to help determine if the file exhibits malicious activities, identify the attack motivation, and understand the potential scope of the breach.
segment.target: Investigate the details of a file associated with a specific alert, behavior, or event to help determine if the file exhibits malicious activities, identify the attack motivation, and understand the potential scope of the breach.

segment.source: You can get information from the following sections in the file view:
segment.target: You can get information from the following sections in the file view:

segment.source: File details
segment.target: File details

segment.source: Deep analysis
segment.target: Deep analysis

segment.source: File in organization
segment.target: File in organization

segment.source: Observed in organization
segment.target: Observed in organization

segment.source: The file details section shows attributes of the file such as its MD5 hash or number and its prevalence worldwide.
segment.target: The file details section shows attributes of the file such as its MD5 hash or number and its prevalence worldwide.

segment.source: The Deep analysis section provides the option of submitting a file for deep analysis to gain detailed visibility on observed suspicious behaviors, and associated artifacts.
segment.target: The Deep analysis section provides the option of submitting a file for deep analysis to gain detailed visibility on observed suspicious behaviors, and associated artifacts.

segment.source: For more information on submitting files for deep analysis, see the Deep analysis topic.
segment.target: For more information on submitting files for deep analysis, see the Deep analysis topic.

segment.source: The File in organization section provides details on the prevalence of the file and the name observed in the organization.
segment.target: The File in organization section provides details on the prevalence of the file and the name observed in the organization.

segment.source: The Observed in organization section provides a chronological view on the events and associated alerts that were observed on the file.
segment.target: The Observed in organization section provides a chronological view on the events and associated alerts that were observed on the file.

segment.source: You'll see a list of machines associated with the file and a description of the action taken by the file.
segment.target: You'll see a list of machines associated with the file and a description of the action taken by the file.

segment.source: Investigate a file
segment.target: Investigate a file

segment.source: Select the file you want to investigate.
segment.target: Select the file you want to investigate.

segment.source: You can select a file from any of the following views or use the Search box:
segment.target: You can select a file from any of the following views or use the Search box:

segment.source: Alerts - click the file links from the Description or Details in the Alert timeline
segment.target: Alerts - click the file links from the Description or Details in the Alert timeline

segment.source: Machines view - click the file links in the Description or Details columns in the Observed on machine section
segment.target: Machines view - click the file links in the Description or Details columns in the Observed on machine section

segment.source: Search box - select File from the drop-down menu and enter the file name
segment.target: Search box - select File from the drop-down menu and enter the file name

segment.source: View the file details.
segment.target: View the file details.

segment.source: Use the search filters to define the search criteria.
segment.target: Use the search filters to define the search criteria.

segment.source: You can also use the timeline search box to further filter displayed search results.
segment.target: You can also use the timeline search box to further filter displayed search results.

segment.source: Deep analysis
segment.target: Deep analysis

segment.source: Cyber security investigations are typically triggered by an alert.
segment.target: Cyber security investigations are typically triggered by an alert.

segment.source: Alerts are related to one or more observed files that are often new or unknown.
segment.target: Alerts are related to one or more observed files that are often new or unknown.

segment.source: Clicking a file takes you to the file view where you can see the file's metadata.
segment.target: Clicking a file takes you to the file view where you can see the file's metadata.

segment.source: To enrich the data related to the file, you can submit the file for deep analysis.
segment.target: To enrich the data related to the file, you can submit the file for deep analysis.

segment.source: The deep analysis feature executes a file in a secure, fully instrumented cloud environment.
segment.target: The deep analysis feature executes a file in a secure, fully instrumented cloud environment.

segment.source: Deep analysis results show the file's activities, observed behaviors, and associated artifacts, such as dropped files, registry modifications, and communication with IPs.
segment.target: Deep analysis results show the file's activities, observed behaviors, and associated artifacts, such as dropped files, registry modifications, and communication with IPs.

segment.source: Deep analysis currently supports extensive analysis of PE (portable executable) files (including .exe and .dll files).
segment.target: Deep analysis currently supports extensive analysis of PE (portable executable) files (including .exe and .dll files).

segment.source: Deep analysis of a file takes several minutes.
segment.target: Deep analysis of a file takes several minutes.

segment.source: When the file analysis is complete, results are made available in the File view page, under a new Deep analysis summary section.
segment.target: When the file analysis is complete, results are made available in the File view page, under a new Deep analysis summary section.

segment.source: The summary includes a list of observed behaviors, some of which can indicate malicious activity, and observables, including contacted IPs and files created on the disk.
segment.target: The summary includes a list of observed behaviors, some of which can indicate malicious activity, and observables, including contacted IPs and files created on the disk.

segment.source: Results of deep analysis are matched against threat intelligence and any matches will generate appropriate alerts.
segment.target: Results of deep analysis are matched against threat intelligence and any matches will generate appropriate alerts.

segment.source: Submit files for analysis
segment.target: Submit files for analysis

segment.source: Use the deep analysis feature to investigate the details of any file, usually during an investigation of an alert or for any other reason where you suspect malicious behavior.
segment.target: Use the deep analysis feature to investigate the details of any file, usually during an investigation of an alert or for any other reason where you suspect malicious behavior.

segment.source: This feature is available in the context of the file view.
segment.target: This feature is available in the context of the file view.

segment.source: In the file's page, Submit for deep analysis is enabled when the file is available in the Windows Defender ATP backend sample collection or if it was observed on a Windows 10 machine that supports submitting to deep analysis.
segment.target: In the file's page, Submit for deep analysis is enabled when the file is available in the Windows Defender ATP backend sample collection or if it was observed on a Windows 10 machine that supports submitting to deep analysis.

segment.source: Note Only files from Windows 10 can be automatically collected.
segment.target: Note Only files from Windows 10 can be automatically collected.

segment.source: You can also manually submit a sample through the Malware Protection Center Portal if the file was not observed on a Windows 10 machine, and wait for Submit for deep analysis button to become available.
segment.target: You can also manually submit a sample through the Malware Protection Center Portal if the file was not observed on a Windows 10 machine, and wait for Submit for deep analysis button to become available.

segment.source: Note Due to backend processing flows in the Malware Protection Center Portal, there could be up to 10 minutes of latency between file submission and availability of the deep analysis feature in Windows Defender ATP.
segment.target: Note Due to backend processing flows in the Malware Protection Center Portal, there could be up to 10 minutes of latency between file submission and availability of the deep analysis feature in Windows Defender ATP.

segment.source: When the sample is collected, Windows Defender ATP runs the file in is a secure environment and creates a detailed report of observed behaviors and associated artifacts, such as files dropped on machines, communication to IPs, and registry modifications.
segment.target: When the sample is collected, Windows Defender ATP runs the file in is a secure environment and creates a detailed report of observed behaviors and associated artifacts, such as files dropped on machines, communication to IPs, and registry modifications.

segment.source: Submit files for deep analysis:
segment.target: Submit files for deep analysis:

segment.source: Select the file that you want to submit for deep analysis.
segment.target: Select the file that you want to submit for deep analysis.

segment.source: You can select or search a file from any of the following views:
segment.target: You can select or search a file from any of the following views:

segment.source: Alerts - click the file links from the Description or Details in the Alert timeline
segment.target: Alerts - click the file links from the Description or Details in the Alert timeline

segment.source: Machines View - click the file links from the Description or Details in the Machine in organization section
segment.target: Machines View - click the file links from the Description or Details in the Machine in organization section

segment.source: Search box - select File from the drop-down menu and enter the file name
segment.target: Search box - select File from the drop-down menu and enter the file name

segment.source: In the Deep analysis section of the file view, click Submit.
segment.target: In the Deep analysis section of the file view, click Submit.

segment.source: You can only submit PE files in the file details seciton
segment.target: You can only submit PE files in the file details seciton

segment.source: Note Only portable executable (PE) files are supported, including .exe and .dll files
segment.target: Note Only portable executable (PE) files are supported, including .exe and .dll files

segment.source: A progress bar is displayed and provides information on the different stages of the analysis.
segment.target: A progress bar is displayed and provides information on the different stages of the analysis.

segment.source: You can then view the report when the analysis is done.
segment.target: You can then view the report when the analysis is done.

segment.source: Note Depending on machine availability, sample collection time can vary.
segment.target: Note Depending on machine availability, sample collection time can vary.

segment.source: There is a 1-hour timeout for sample collection.
segment.target: There is a 1-hour timeout for sample collection.

segment.source: The collection will fail and the operation will abort if there is no online Windows 10 machine reporting at that time.
segment.target: The collection will fail and the operation will abort if there is no online Windows 10 machine reporting at that time.

segment.source: You can re-submit files for deep analysis to get fresh data on the file.
segment.target: You can re-submit files for deep analysis to get fresh data on the file.

segment.source: View deep analysis report
segment.target: View deep analysis report

segment.source: View the deep analysis report that Windows Defender ATP provides to see the details of the deep analysis that was conducted on the file you submitted.
segment.target: View the deep analysis report that Windows Defender ATP provides to see the details of the deep analysis that was conducted on the file you submitted.

segment.source: This feature is available in the file view context.
segment.target: This feature is available in the file view context.

segment.source: You can view the comprehensive report that provides details on:
segment.target: You can view the comprehensive report that provides details on:

segment.source: Observed behaviors
segment.target: Observed behaviors

segment.source: Associated artifacts
segment.target: Associated artifacts

segment.source: The details provided can help you investigate if there are indications of a potential attack.
segment.target: The details provided can help you investigate if there are indications of a potential attack.

segment.source: View deep analysis reports:
segment.target: View deep analysis reports:

segment.source: Select the file you submitted for deep analysis.
segment.target: Select the file you submitted for deep analysis.

segment.source: Click See the report below.
segment.target: Click See the report below.

segment.source: Information on the analysis is displayed.
segment.target: Information on the analysis is displayed.

segment.source: The deep analysis report shows detailed information across a number of categories
segment.target: The deep analysis report shows detailed information across a number of categories

segment.source: Troubleshooting deep analysis
segment.target: Troubleshooting deep analysis

segment.source: If you encounter a problem when trying to submit a file, try each of the following troubleshooting steps.
segment.target: If you encounter a problem when trying to submit a file, try each of the following troubleshooting steps.

segment.source: Troubleshoot deep analysis:
segment.target: Troubleshoot deep analysis:

segment.source: Ensure the file is a PE.
segment.target: Ensure the file is a PE.

segment.source: PE files typically have .exe or .dll extensions (executable programs or applications).
segment.target: PE files typically have .exe or .dll extensions (executable programs or applications).

segment.source: Ensure the service has access to the file, that it still exists, and has not been corrupted or modified.
segment.target: Ensure the service has access to the file, that it still exists, and has not been corrupted or modified.

segment.source: You can wait a short while and try to submit the file again, in case the queue is full or there was a temporary connection or communication error.
segment.target: You can wait a short while and try to submit the file again, in case the queue is full or there was a temporary connection or communication error.

segment.source: Verify the policy setting enables sample collection and try to submit the file again.
segment.target: Verify the policy setting enables sample collection and try to submit the file again.

segment.source: a.
segment.target: a.

segment.source: Change the following registry entry and values to change the policy on specific endpoints:
segment.target: Change the following registry entry and values to change the policy on specific endpoints:

segment.source: Change the organizational unit through the Group Policy.
segment.target: Change the organizational unit through the Group Policy.

segment.source: See Configure with Group Policy.
segment.target: See Configure with Group Policy.

segment.source: If these steps do not resolve the issue, contact winatp@microsoft.com.
segment.target: If these steps do not resolve the issue, contact winatp@microsoft.com.

segment.source: Note If the value AllowSampleCollection is not available, the client will allow sample collection by default.
segment.target: Note If the value AllowSampleCollection is not available, the client will allow sample collection by default.

segment.target: Investigate machines in the Windows Defender ATP Machines view

segment.target: Investigate an IP address associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
